title: Students stage 'lie-in' at White House to protest against gun violence
text:
Students stage 'lie-in' at White House to protest against gun violence 12:56am IST - 00:50 
Several dozen high school students from in and around Washington, D.C., staged a 'lie-in' in front of the White House to protest against gun violence in schools. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Several dozen high school students from in and around Washington, D.C., staged a 'lie-in' in front of the White House to protest against gun violence in schools. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2sBfl1w
